amendment.description: To provide an additional $430,000,000 for the Department of Veteran Affairs for Medical Services for outpatient care and treatment for veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3642 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 84 - 13. Record Vote Number: 98.

action.text: Amendment SA 3642 proposed by Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S3560-3563, S3564; text: CR S3560) To provide an additional $430,000,000 for the Department of Veteran Affairs for Medical Services for outpatient care and treatment for veterans.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3642 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 84 - 13. Record Vote Number: 98.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3642 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 84 - 13. Record Vote Number: 98.
